links.quantification: LCA mandates → low-carbon cement/steel procurement → 40% embodied carbon reduction → 120 MT CO₂ avoided by 2030

LCA capacity gap: India lacks embodied carbon database → need 3-year baseline data development → infrastructure before enforcement
LCA mandates → green material demand → industry scales production → costs drop → market transformation (virtuous cycle)

Via recycling: 70% material recovery → less virgin extraction → mining footprint reduction → ecosystem preservation
